meanings.definition: The study of diseases and their causes.
meanings.sent1: In pathobiologies, scientists investigate how diseases develop in the body.
meanings.sent2: Pathobiologies is essential for understanding the origins of various illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The pathobiologies class was so interesting that even the lab mice paid attention.
meanings.sent4: The intricate web of pathobiologies unraveled the mystery behind the outbreak.
meanings.sent5: Through pathobiologies, we can unravel the secrets of disease progression.

meanings.definition: The branch of biology that deals with the study of diseases.
meanings.sent1: Doctors specializing in pathobiologies work tirelessly to find cures for illnesses.
meanings.sent2: Pathobiologies plays a crucial role in identifying new treatment methods.
meanings.sent3: The pathobiologies department always had the most intriguing case studies.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for pathobiologies shone through in every research project she undertook.
meanings.sent5: The world of pathobiologies is filled with endless possibilities for medical advancements.
